I agree, would be great to have a torrent with costumes included :) thanks

FYI to everyone interested on costumes:
It isn't really possible to include the costume patch because the patch allows you to select from several costumes for each character and replaces these costume files on the disc on-the-fly with the patched costumes from the SD card.
So - it IS possible to replace the current costumes with ONE from the patch - but nothing that would allow you to toggle in between them.
I have made a copy with one costume replaced just to see it - and trust me - you aren't really missing anything, it is just minor color variations.
